tool_description: Get demographic data for chosen countries in a specific year
name: World Demographics
title: World Demographics

api_list.name: Country Demographics Data
api_list.description: Retrieve demographics data for a specific country in a specific year using its ISO3/ISO2 codes or locId and a year.

required_parameters.name: countrycode
required_parameters.description: The ISO3/ISO2 code of the country or locId.

api_list.name: World Demographics Data
api_list.description: Retrieve demographics data for the entire world in a specific year.

api_list.name: Country List
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of countries along with their ISO3/ISO2 codes and locId.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-demographics.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-demographics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Region List
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of regions along with their locId.

api_list.name: Region Demographics Data
api_list.description: Retrieve demographics data for a specific region in a specific year using its locId and a year.
